title: Who has the best laugh again.
body:
Sorry if this is extremely obvious

Right now im torn between {{champion:7}} and {{champion:238}} .

{{champion:99}} doesnt count >:)

EDIT: First of all I pick {{champion:7}}, so funny lmao
also wow omg everyone didn't really agree on the same person like I expected them to xD.

Well let's tally this up.

LeBlanc: 2
Jinx: 2
Nunubot: 2
Diana: 2
Zed: 2
Quinn: 1
Gnar: 1
Draven: 1
Teemo: 1
Lux (ew): 1
AhrI: 1
Mordekaiser: 1
Nidalee (cougar): 1
Singed: 1
Darius: 1

Might make a poll in the near future if so many champions are just going to have the same amount of votes.

replies.body: Ahem excuse me ladies and gentlemen I think we have a clear winner {{champion:150}} {{champion:150}} {{champion:150}}
I'd have to say Jinx because she can get excited a lot..
Nunubot teemo zed lux (obviouly not teemo) and singed
Jinx, set and forget laugh is the best.
Hearing {{champion:27}} laugh as he runs around at high speed drives people up the wall...
LeBlanc. Zed's is overused and annoying. Literally every troll video/pentakill/fail/bronze moment etc etc etc utilises his laugh and has in turn made it unfunny and stupid.
